definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: The genesis and development of staminate flowers and the bisexual flowers of"Lanzhou melon"have been observed.
sentences.chinese: 本工作觀察了白蘭瓜雄花和兩性花的發生和發育過程。

sentences.english: My friend has just come back from Lanzhou, bringing me two genuine honeydew melons.
sentences.chinese: 回來給我帶了兩個正宗的白蘭瓜。
